channel.title: Pissed off because the little mods,
channel.description: title say's it all, the just closed my thread for nothing,:S so many people download it and they didnt have any problems, faggots

item.title: Pissed off because the little mods,
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

If your server truly didn’t have any problems and you messaged me more respectably i would have more than likely allowed you to repost your topic. But seeing you throw little fits like this leads me to believe you’re the kind of person that would put a virus in the file.

Read full topic
item.source: Pissed off because the little mods,

item.title: Pissed off because the little mods,
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Throwing a fit like this won’t solve anything. The moderators do not hold a grudge towards rule breakers until they throw fits about it.

Make another post like this and ill ban you in a heartbeat.

ChaosPkers:

I’m sure there was some reason. Give me the link to the topic. And this should be in the complaints about staff thread to

From the looks of the reported thread the server had a virus and was also closed source. The owner claimed they were hidden as an anti leech.

This isn’t hide and go seek, make the files visible.

Read full topic
item.source: Pissed off because the little mods,
